articles.author: Herman Mostert
articles.title: Laura Wolvaardt confirmed as full-time Proteas Women captain
articles.description: Cricket South Africa has confirmed that Laura Wolvaardt will be the permanent captain of the Proteas Women in all three formats of the game.
articles.content:
• Laura Wolvaardt has been confirmed as the new captain of the Proteas Women.
  • The 24-year-old will be South Africa's permanent captain in all three formats.
  • Cricket SA also name… [+5492 chars]

articles.author: Andrew McMurtry
articles.title: Cricket farce ‘simply shouldn’t happen’
articles.description: Brisbane Heat spinner Jess Jonassen has ridden her luck to help her WBBL team book its place in the tournament finals.
articles.content:
Brisbane Heat spinner Jess Jonassen has ridden her luck to help her WBBL team book its place in the tournament finals.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
